- `special` (bool) - Include special characters in the result. These are `!@#$%&*()-_=+[]{}<>:?`.

- `upper` (bool) - Include uppercase alphabet characters in the result.

- `lower` (bool) - Include lowercase alphabet characters in the result.

- `numeric` (bool) - Include numeric characters in the result.

- `min_numeric` (int64) - Minimum number of numeric characters in the result. Default value is 0

- `min_upper` (int64) - Minimum number of uppercase alphabet characters in the result. Default value is 0

- `min_lower` (int64) - Minimum number of lowercase alphabet characters in the result. Default value is 0

- `min_special` (int64) - Minimum number of special characters in the result. Default value is 0

- `override_special` (string) - Supply your own list of special characters to use for string generation.
  This overrides the default character list in the special argument.
  The `special` argument must still be set to true for any overwritten characters to be used in generation.

<!-- End of code generated from the comments of the Config struct in datasource/password/data.go; -->
